content: While total gaming revenues in the region were down slightly, play from our core customers continue to grow rising 2% against the robust third quarter comparison last year. And in our Midwest and south segment, business trends remain consistent with the last several quarters, excluding our online business and Sky River management fee, revenues rose slightly over the prior year. This quarter, the gaming revenue growth from our core customer helped to offset declines and spend from the stimulus driven results we benefited from last year during the third quarter. Hey guys, good afternoon. Hey guys, good afternoon. Sequentially, consumer trends continue to be very stable and itâs really just trying to understand and get around the comparisons when you look at how robust some of the growth was last year, given everything that was going on around stimulus and some of the pandemic related impacts. Joe, your line is now open. The only other thing I would add to that â the only thing I would add to that, Joe, and it was really kind of the last part of your question around, I think when you look at expense trends for our business so far year to date, theyâve been very stable from quarter to quarter to quarter. Joe, your line is now open.
